issue.title: [CF 686] Request: Burning Embers 'fragment' tracking
issue.body:
There is already a way to track the number of 'Burning Embers' here:

http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/forum/warlock/42454-destruction-track-burning-embers/

However, each Burning Ember consists of 10 fragments, according to these two sources:

http://www.wowhead.com/spell=108647/burning-embers

http://www.wowdb.com/spells/108647-burning-embers

It would be optimal if there were a way to see when a given Burning Ember is going to be up as opposed to only seeing when it is actually up e.g. making TMW track 0.1, 0.2, ... -> 4.0 on the icon. I can only find the fragments definition under 'conditions' and I'm unsure of how to translate that into usefulness.


> Posted by CurseForge user catastrofe | Imported from CurseForge issue #686 | Raw

comments.body:
I will have to add a new tag to DogTag, but this is certainly something that is possible without a whole lot of effort.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I added new tags that should be included in TMW r670

Use [BurningEmbers] and [BurningEmberParts] to track these. Use [BurningEmberParts/10] if you want decimal amounts.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
